channel.title: Milk on Tiny Tavern
channel.description: Recent content in Milk on Tiny Tavern

item.title: Blueberry Pancakes
item.description: A stack of fluffy, blueberry pancakes dusted with powdered sugar, topped with whipped cream and blueberry compote.

item.title: Blueberry Waffles
item.description: A stack of fluffy, blueberry waffles dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream and blueberry compote.

item.title: Cappuccino
item.description: This smooth, creamy, and classic coffee beverage is whipped and topped with a layer of foamed milk

item.title: Caramel Dalgona
item.description: This version of the Dalgona blends caramel syrup into the foamy coffee creation

item.title: Caramel Latte
item.description: This delicious coffee drink is infused with caramel syrup and topped with a layer of foamed milk or whipped cream

item.title: Caramel Macchiato
item.description: This premium coffee beverage is whipped to perfection and topped with a layer of foamed milk or whipped cream

item.title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
item.description: A stack of fluffy, chocolate chip pancakes dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream and ice cream.

item.title: Chocolate Chip Waffles
item.description: A stack of fluffy, chocolate chip waffles dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream and ice cream.

item.title: Chocolate Milkshake
item.description: Chocolate ice cream, milk, chocolate syrup, whipped cream, sprinkles

item.title: Chocolate Mocha
item.description: The perfect balance of coffee and chocolate, topped with whipped cream and chocolate syrup

item.title: Chocolate Oreo Milkshake
item.description: Chocolate ice cream, milk, Oreo cookies, chocolate syrup, whipped cream, crushed Oreo bits

item.title: Cinnamon Swirl Pancakes
item.description: A stack of fluffy, cinnamon swirl pancakes dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream.

item.title: Cinnamon Toast Waffles
item.description: A stack of fluffy, cinnamon toast waffles dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream.

item.title: Dalgona/Whipped Coffee
item.description: This deliciously whisked caffeine drink is topped with a floating infusion of coffee goodness

item.title: Oreo Milkshake
item.description: Vanilla ice cream, milk, Oreo cookies, whipped cream, crushed Oreo bits

item.title: Pancake/Waffle Platter
item.description: (Served with jam, compote, or whipped cream) 3 pancakes or waffles of your choice, 2 scrambled eggs, 2 crispy turkey bacon or saut√©ed sausages, and 2 slices of toast.

item.title: Peppermint Chocolate
item.description: This delicious chocolatey drink is infused with peppermint syrup and topped with whipped cream

item.title: Regular Pancakes
item.description: A stack of fluffy, traditional pancakes dusted with powdered sugar and topped with strawberry/guava jam or strawberry/blueberry compote and whipped cream.

item.title: Regular Waffles
item.description: A stack of fluffy, classic waffles dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream and strawberry/blueberry compote.

item.title: Salted Caramel Chocolate
item.description: This delicious chocolatey drink is infused with salted caramel and topped with whipped cream

item.title: Spanish Latte
item.description: This version of a latte is made with sweetened condensed milk, whipped to perfection, and topped with foamed milk or whipped cream

item.title: Strawberry Milkshake
item.description: Strawberry ice cream, fresh strawberries, milk, whipped cream
